qas.question: Who is the university accredited by?
The academic body of the university is made up of how many divisions of graduate?
The academic body of the university is made up of how many professional schools?
How many divisions of graduate research does the University of Higher Learning consist of?
How many professional schools does the University of Higher Learning consist of?

plausible_answers.text: Fermilab, Argonne National Laboratory, and the Marine Biological Laboratory

qas.question: The U of C has ties to several dependent institutions, including?
By which Commission is the University of Chicago Press accredited?

plausible_answers.text: the College, four divisions of graduate research and seven professional schools

qas.question: What do the academic bodies of the University of Chicago Medical Center consist of?

context: The academic bodies of the University of Chicago consist of <b7_0>the College, <a1_0><a1_1><a1_2><b3_0>four<b3_0/><a1_2/><a1_1/><a1_0/> divisions of graduate research and <a2_0><a2_1><a2_2><b4_0>seven<b4_0/><a2_2/><a2_1/><a2_0/> professional schools<b7_0/>. The university also contains a library system, the University of Chicago Press, the University of Chicago Laboratory Schools, and the University of Chicago Medical Center, and holds ties with a number of independent academic institutions, including <b5_0>Fermilab, Argonne National Laboratory, and the Marine Biological Laboratory<b5_0/>. The university is accredited by <a0_0><a0_1><a0_2><b6_0>The Higher Learning Commission<b6_0/><a0_2/><a0_1/><a0_0/>.
